com.st.st25sdk.type1

Class Type1Tag

  • java.lang.Object
    • com.st.st25sdk.NFCTag
      • com.st.st25sdk.type1.Type1Tag

  • public class Type1Tag
extends NFCTag
    Defines all required methods to handle TYPE1 NFC tags

        public boolean isStaticMemoryMap()
        Check the HR0 Lower nibbel to determine the Type1 Tag memory map
        Returns:

                        int sizeInBytes)
                 throws STException
        Description copied from class: NFCTag
        Read a number of Bytes at a given address In case of read error, the STException will contain the data that we have been able to read. Use e.getErrorData() to retrieve them.

        Parameters:

      • writeBytes

        public void writeBytes(int byteAddress,
                       byte[] data)
                throws STException
        Description copied from class: NFCTag
        Write some Bytes at a given address WARNING: After this write, the cache may not be aligned anymore with tag's memory content so it is recommended to invalidate the cache.
        Specified by:
        writeBytes in class NFCTag
        Parameters:
        byteAddress - First address to be written
